name: STAY UP!
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

E - Pick up/ Eat

R - Throw

Multiplayer (Only Local):

Player 1:

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

E - Pick up/ Eat

R - Throw

Player 2:

ARROW KEYS - Move

RIGHT CTRL - Jump

O - Pick up/ Eat

P - Throw

Open for feedback!! :D

Credits:

Sounds & BGM: Freesound.org <3

3D model assets: Me! 

This project is for my school assignment to create a game without words/texts.
